experience.title: Python for ML/AI intern
experience.description: Worked as an intern in ETG, I learned a lot. I learned python basics, data structure, JSON, NumPy, pandas, and basics of AI, ML, and DL. I create projects in Inventory management systems, in Data analysis, and in Deep learning. 1. Inventory Management System:  Summer olympic data analysis :  Car manufacturing analysis :  Breast Cancer Detection :

projects: [{"title":"Breast Cancer Detection","description":"This project is made by adam algorithm. I use sklearn library for loading the dataset keras library for creating neural network, StandardScaler for set the range of data and use relu and sigmoid activation fuction in the neural network."},{"title":"Summer Olympic Data Analysis","description":"Summer Olympic Data Analysis project using NumPy and pandas library.
